Plot: In a secluded house by the sea with the curtains shut, a screenwriter hides from the world with only his dog as company. The tranquility is abruptly broken one night by the arrival of a ...
Title: Closed Curtain
Actors: Kambuzia Partovi, Maryam Moqadam, Jafar Panahi, Hadi Saeedi
tomatoConsensus: Ambitious and exquisitely crafted, Jafar Panahi's semi-nonfiction tale is a powerful, imaginative portrait of an artist's despair.
